animeDescription: A group of alien girls from planet Blade Star come to earth after their home planet got destroyed. They all have powerful Super-Lake Crystals that allow them to transform into superheroines. led by Blade Knight, they must fight Oleana, an evil space dominatrix, their toughest enemy.  (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Oikawa, Hitomi', 'Asami, Junko', 'Kanai, Mika', 'Koorogi, Satomi', 'Katsuki, Masako']
animeStaff: [['Tsuruoka Youta', ['Sound Director']], ['Pikabia', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Koyama Kenji', ['Sound Effects']], ['Nishiyama Masanori', ['Background Art']]]
